Learn about the Theocratic Ministry School & the insanity that it entails.

Growing up in this religion you don’t see the signs. This Organization screams cult! And you will remain in this cult if you don’t apply my principles.

If you’ve watched this video I want to thank you for your patience and dedication to watch and support me.

Help me expose this cult! #share this video: https://youtu.be/nwJtRcJkVaA

They sexually #abuse kids, they force #children into #slavery, they hold families hostage and #shun smart people, who they like to call #apostates. Anyone who follows #jesus is condemned.

This #religion #organization & #brotherhood I defended for 30+ years must be put down! I do not attack because I am #evil. Nor do I do this in #retaliation. This is purely #educational, #informative, #beneficial, and may just be #lifesaving! Please #share and help the cause!!
